All code have bugs and more so for ZK proof systems which are complex. One way is to have diff. impl. of the same system and cross-ref them. While we have client diversity for Ethereum, what do we have for ZK-rollups?
Maybe multi-factor verification?

— Chua Zheng Leong (@melynx) July 3, 2023
